title: Received money for starting a YouTube gaming channel but then advised him against it, is money halal
transcript: foreign [Music] for my brother where he used to make gaming videos I received 270 taka in excess for opening this channel he opened the channel just for fun and not for any money income later I make him understand and stop his channel now my money has has been halal the money you received was it in return for some ads no shirt it's it is for to make the channel from him from him yeah no problem inshallah as long as he did not earn anything Haram from it or do anything Haram in it there's no problem inshallah um [Music] and have you ever taken a counseling session with me go to my website and you will find counseling sessions and apply for one if you can afford it that's good for you if you cannot you're entitled for one free session and this is for everybody if they can affirm by Allah that they cannot afford it because they're poor I'll give them one free session without a problem a full half an hour so come to me and let's speak about it inshallah within the following two days or three days and the evening I will uh try and seek Allah's guidance to solve your problem once and for Allah foreign
